divs: Sighting DetailsI live in the country, no streetlights. I was at the end of our driveway away from the porch light taking the trash to the road. I noticed the triangle with lights on the corners and heard a faint jet engine far away, I saw 2 other lights I thought were airliners at a higher altitude. As I watched the triangle it was moving North, I thought it was making the noise. I cant guess the altitude but it was high, about 35 degrees above the horizon. It continued north for about 30 seconds after I noticed it and then turned East, at that point the 2 "airliners" turned to follow it and I realised they were much closer than I thought and much smaller than the triangle. It seemed to be their engines I heard. I dont know if the triangle made noise or not, it seemed to be pretty far away. It turned East and either the lights went out, or werent visible anymore I didnt see it again. The 2 jets (maybe military?) turned East to follow the triangle and continued East. They didnt change course as I went back to the house and finally couldnt see them for the trees around my house.
